ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ( ($Profile.Name = "CoIT Bolivar Base Technician Profile" || $Profile.Name = "CoIT Proveedor Base Partner Bolivar") && ISPICKVAL(CoIT_WOM_Scheduling_Type__c, "Emergency") && (ISPICKVAL(Status, "Dispatched") || ISPICKVAL(Status, "Travel") || ISPICKVAL(Status, "In Progress") || ISPICKVAL(Status, "Completed") || ISPICKVAL(Status, "Canceled")) && ( ISCHANGED(SchedStartTime) || ISCHANGED(FSSK__FSK_Assigned_Service_Resource__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: No puedes cambiar la programaci√≥n de la cita de servicio Emergencia
